meanings.definition: Able to be included on a list.
meanings.sent1: The names of all the students in the class are listable for the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent2: The grocery items are listable on the shopping list for easy reference.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how even the most listable items can sometimes go missing.
meanings.sent4: Her achievements were so listable that they stood out like bright stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time is listable, yet its passing is intangible and unstoppable.

meanings.sent1: The new products are listable for the upcoming catalog.
meanings.sent2: The available job positions are listable on the company's website.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing how the most listable items are often the ones people forget to write down.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were so listable that they sparked creativity in everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The rules of the game are listable, but the strategies are what make it exciting and unpredictable.

meanings.sent1: The various options are listable for the customers to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The different categories are listable in the report for better organization.
meanings.sent3: It's interesting how even the most listable choices can lead to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent4: His talents were so listable that they made him a sought-after candidate for any project.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients for the recipe are listable, but the secret spice adds a special touch.
